name: plant-uml-ext
description: Supports preview, export, templates, snippets & syntax highlighting of PlantUML

commands.title: Open PlantUML Preview
commands.description: Preview the current PlantUML artifact (ie. file or selection) in a side view panel

commands.title: Export PlantUML text ...
commands.description: Export the current PlantUML text file in a graphic representation (eg. PNG, SVG, etc)

commands.title: Import PlantUML template ...
commands.description: Import a PlantUML template as a basis for your model (eg. Activity, Class, Sequence, etc UML diagrams)

commands.title: Toggle PlantUML Live Preview
commands.description: Turns on/off live previewing whilst editing such that the modeler is not distracted with syntax errors & repeated updates

commands.title: Add PlantUML VizJS Support
commands.description: Due to the 20mb VSCode extension limit, the required VizJS support files must be added to the extension's library folder post marketplace install. Use this command to download any missing support files and restart when prompted

plantuml.editing.livepreview.delay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait after the last text edit before the PlantUML live preview is triggered for update

plantuml.renderer.JAVA_HOME.description: PlantUML requires Java to the run the PlantUML binaries. If you leave this variable value as 'auto' then the JAVA_HOME OS environmental variable will be used
